wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Simpson Hutchison Forsyth (29 September 1928 – 30 March 2020) was a Scottish footballer who played in the Scottish Football League for Albion Rovers and East Stirlingshire and in the English Football League for Darlington in the 1950s. He also played junior football for Linlithgow Rose. After retiring as a player because of injury, he went on to work as chief scout for East Stirlingshire, and later became a director of the club.Forsyth died on 30 March 2020.

response: Alex Forsyth or Alexander Forsyth may refer to:
* Alex Forsyth (born 1955), ice hockey player in the National Hockey League
* 30 March 2020: Alex Forsyth, 91, Darlington outside right.
*30 March: Alex Forsyth, 91, Albion Rovers and East Stirlingshire outside right.
*Alex Forsyth, 91, Scottish footballer (Albion Rovers, Darlington, East Stirlingshire).Alex Forsyth
